article_text: National leaders in the healthcare industry came together Monday at the University of Miami’s Business of Health Care conference to discuss innovation in the field and touch on Florida’s future in the industry.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Medicaid expansion, Affordable Care Act, Affordable Care Act Florida, Obamacare, Obamacare Florida, Donna Shalala, University of Miami, Patrick Conway, CMS, Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
